posts.post_content:
Sheckard(SOLD) and McCormick, both from Pennsylvania, both PSA 3, only $42 shipped.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10569/sheckard-glove[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10472/mccormick[/IMG]

Sheckard has been shipped.  Moose McCormick remains and I'll drop him to $42 shipped.

I am considering throwing in a Bill Skowron card so I can change the title of the thread to 

"MEESE FOR SALE"
You could add a Mike Mussina and make it MEESES for sale.
